    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ApplicationForBasics
    The main class for basics research.
    ApplicationForCollections
    The main class for the collections research.
    ApplicationForCollectorsTeeing
    The main launcher for the research of the method Collectors.teeing(java.util.stream.Collector<? super T, ?, R1>, java.util.stream.Collector<? super T, ?, R2>, java.util.function.BiFunction<? super R1, ? super R2, R>).
    ApplicationForDatesAndTimes
    The main class for the dates and times research.
    ApplicationForFiles
    The main launcher for files research.
    ApplicationForGathering
    The main launcher for the research of the gathering operations.
    ApplicationForMethods
    The main launcher for methods research.
    ApplicationForProcesses
    The main class for processes research.
    ApplicationForReactiveStreams
    The main launcher for the reactive programming model research.
    ApplicationForRecords
    The main launcher for records research.
    ApplicationForRegex
    The main launcher for regular expressions research.
    ApplicationForSockets
    The launcher for the socket wrappers: insecure and secure.
    ApplicationForSorting
    The main class for sorting research.
    ApplicationForStreamsCollecting
    The main launcher for the Stream collecting research.
    ApplicationForStreamsFragmentation
    The main launcher for the Stream fragmentation research.
    ApplicationForSynchronizers
    The main class for synchronizers research.
    ApplicationForTasks
    The main class for task research.
    ApplicationForWebClient
    The HttpClient launcher.
    ApplicationForWebServer
    The HTTP server starter and the default browser launcher.
    Apportions
    The apportions of the sets and the maps.
    Arity
    The multi arity.
    BorderAroundText
    The border around a text.
    BorderAroundText.AllHeavy
    The border with all heavy sides.
    BorderAroundText.Double
    The double border.
    BorderAroundText.HeavySides
    The border with heavy left and right sides.
    BorderAroundText.Light
    The light border.
    Cardinal
    The cardinal numbers.
    ClassForClassFileDisassembler
    The class created for the JDK tool
    'javap' (the Java Class File Disassembler).

    Run from batch file "* Batch Menu.bat".
    ConditionBoundLock
    Utilizes ReentrantLock and Condition to manage a Deque with concurrent access.
    Constants
    The constants.
    ConstantsForFiles
    The constants for files and directories.
    Contrasting
    Contrasting the methods calling.
    CyclicBarrierLauncher
    The CyclicBarrier launcher.
    DatesAndTimesAggregation
    The dates and times aggregation.
    DatesAndTimesChanging
    The dates and times changing.
    Declarations
    Only local variables declarations (these variables are mostly unused).
    EngineBothWays
    The engine with sending and receiving.
    EngineReceiving
    The engine with receiving.
    EngineSending
    The engine with sending.
    FilesAndZipFiles
    Reading the files and the ZIP files.
    FindHandleAndInvoke
    Find the method handle and invoke it.
    Flattening
    Flattening the streams.
    FlowLauncher
    The launcher for subscribers and publishers.
    FunctionalInterfaceExample
    Any interface with a Single Abstract Method is a functional interface.
    FunctionalInterfaceWrapper
    The wrapper for the functional interface.
    FunctionComposer
    The function composer.
    InsecureSocketWrapper
    The insecure implementation of the SocketWrapper.
    InstanceChecking
    The class instance checking.
    Iterating
    Iterating over the stream.
    LambdaExpressionsBox
    The box with lambda expressions.
    Multidimensionals
    The multidimensional array and the multidimensional list.
    Multiplier
    The multipliers.
    NullsAndOptionals
    The streams with 'null' and Optional elements.
    OrdinalPrecedence
    The ordinal numbers - precedence or effect.
    OrdinalSpatial
    The ordinal numbers - spatial or chronological.
    PatternMatching
    Demonstrates pattern matching.
    PausedByVolatile
    Demonstrates the use of a spin-wait loop for pausing a thread execution.
    PeriodicPublisher<T>
    The periodic publisher.
    PermittedRecord
    The permitted record.
    PermittedSubclassFinal
    The permitted final subclass.
    PermittedSubclassNonSealed
    The permitted non-sealed subclass.
    PermittedSubclassSubclassFinal
    The permitted final subclass.
    PhaserLauncher
    The Phaser launcher.
    Preferable
    Demonstrates preferable coding practices for collections.
    Printer
    A wrapper for 'Java Util Logging' with a simplified format.
    It prints only the message without any other items (like date, level).
    Processor
    The processor which uses the lambda expressions box.
    ProcessorImpl<S,T>
    The implementation of the Flow.Processor.
    PropertyFiles
    Reading the property files.
    ProxyAndInvoke
    Proxy and invoke.
    PublisherImpl
    The implementation of the Flow.Publisher.
    RandomTextsGenerator
    The random text generator.
    RecordPatterns
    Research the record patterns.
    ReplacingWithMatcher
    The wrapper for the text replacing with the Matcher.
    Reporter
    Reports about the processes, the system, and the environment.
    SafeFutureCompletion
    Completes the CompletableFuture in a safe way.
    SealedClass
    The non-subclassable, sealed class.
    SealedInterface
    The non-subclassable, sealed interface.
    SecureSocketWrapper
    The secure implementation of the SocketWrapper.
    Sequenced
    Research the SequencedCollection, the SequencedSet, the SortedSet, the SequencedMap, and the SortedMap.
    SharedResourceWithReentrantLock
    Demonstrates controlled access to a shared resource by multiple threads using a ReentrantLock.
    SimpleFileVisitorExtension
    The extension of the SimpleFileVisitor.
    SingleFileSourceCodeProgram
    The single-file source-code program.
    SocketWrapper
    Wrapper class for managing a ServerSocket.
    StackMemoryVersusHeapSpace
    Demonstrates the concepts of Stack Memory and Heap Space.
    StageCompletion
    Research on task stage completion using CompletableFuture.
    StreamFiltering
    The wrapper for the text stream filtering.
    StringInterning
    String pool is an example of the Flyweight Design Pattern.
    SubscriberImpl<T>
    The implementation of the Flow.Subscriber.
    SubscriberImplForByteBufferList
    The implementation of the Flow.Subscriber for the ByteBuffer list.
    SubscriptionImpl
    The Flow.Subscription implementation with a limited number of items in the sequence.
    TemporaryFilesAndZipFiles
    Writing and reading the temporary files and the ZIP files.
    TemporaryFilesWritingAndReading
    Writing and reading the temporary file with bytes and the temporary file with strings.
    Tokenization
    The wrapper for splitting texts with the Pattern or with the Scanner.
    Traversing
    Traversing the List, the Queue, and the Deque.
    Utils
    Utilities.
    Var
    The local variable type inference.
    VirtualThreadsAndPlatformThreads
    Demonstrates the usage of platform threads and virtual threads.
    VisitorWrapper
    The wrapper for the SimpleFileVisitorExtension.
    WebFlowLauncher
    Reads the content from the web server with subscribers.
    WebHandlers
    Handlers for the web server.
    WebServerLauncher
    The launcher for the HttpServer.
    XmlFiles
    Reading the XML files.
